item.title: Revolut Art – Helping digital artists showcase their work and interact with other artists
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Revolut Art is a social media platform focused on helping digital artists showcase their work and get feedback from other artists.
Check out the platform: https://www.revolutart.com/#home

item.title: Knightley – Making startup funding less complicated
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
One of the barriers for early-stage startups to raise funding is their lack of understanding of due diligence. Knightley is a website that helps startups by organizing all their documentation in one centralized location (their Data Room). Additionally, Knightley serves as a platform for investors to look into startups’ data rooms and to track KPIs before they invest.
Check them out: https://www.knightley.co/

item.title: BestFit Article
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Imagine that you just got into your dream college. You’ve been working countless hours during your past 4 years of high school to get to this point, and this is the exciting moment that tells you that it all paid off. Now, imagine knowing that there was a 75% chance that you wouldn’t graduate before you even stepped foot on campus. Well, this is a real statistic that applies to low-income, minority, and first-generation students who attend college. This is also the statistic that BestFit hopes to eliminate.
